cards.name: Balon Greyjoy
cards.text: Pillage. Renown. Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a card in an opponent's discard pile and put it into play under your control. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, shuffle it into its owner's deck.

cards.name: Euron Crow's Eye
cards.text: Intimidate. Reaction: After you marshal Euron Crow's Eye, search your hand, deck, and discard pile for Silence and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Asha Greyjoy
cards.text: Pillage. Stealth. Each other unique Ironborn character you control gains stealth.

cards.name: The Knight
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. While The Knight is attacking alone, he gains stealth and renown.

cards.name: Aeron Damphair
cards.text: Insight. Reaction: After another Drowned God character you control is killed, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: The Drumm
cards.text: While The Drumm is attacking in a [military] or [power] challenge, each character with an [intrigue] icon cannot be declared as a defender.

cards.name: Gwynesse Harlaw
cards.text: Action: Choose 3 cards in an opponent's discard pile and place them on the bottom of his or her deck in any order. Then, gain 1 gold and draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Andrik the Unsmiling
cards.text: Pillage. Reaction: After Andrik the Unsmiling discards a card using pillage, choose a non-limited location or attachment in the losing opponent's discard pile. Discard 1 copy of that card from play.

cards.name: Qarl the Maid
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Qarl the Maid is participating, either: stand a Warship location, or stand Asha Greyjoy.

cards.name: Maester Murenmure
cards.text: Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered location ability would initiate, kneel Maester Murenmure to cancel those effects.

cards.name: Old Grey Gull
cards.text: Action: Kneel Old Grey Gull to kill another [greyjoy] character you control. Then, you may return that character from your dead pile to your hand.

cards.name: Priest of Old Wyk
cards.text: While there is a Drowned God character in your dead pile, Priest of Old Wyk contributes its STR to your total for dominance even while kneeling.

cards.name: Drowned Prophet
cards.text: Interrupt: When Drowned Prophet is killed, search the top 5 cards of your deck for a [greyjoy] character and place it in your dead pile. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Eager Deckhand
cards.text: Reaction: After a Warship location enters play under your control, put Eager Deckhand into play from your hand.

cards.name: Orkmont Reaver
cards.text:
Pillage.
While an opponent has 10 or more cards in his or her discard pile, Orkmont Reaver gains stealth.

cards.name: Silence
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel Silence to put a Warship location into play from your hand. Then, if you control Euron Crow's Eye, stand him. +2 Initiative.

cards.name: Great Wyk
cards.text: Reaction: After a character enters play from your dead pile, each opponent chooses and discards 1 card from his or her hand. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Golden Storm
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge as the attacking player, kneel Golden Storm to choose and kill a participating character. Then, if you control a participating Raider character, stand Golden Storm.

cards.name: Maiden's Bane
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, kneel Maiden's Bane to choose and stand an attacking character. Then, if that character is a Captain, stand Maiden's Bane.

cards.name: Scouting Vessel
cards.text: Interrupt: When a character you control discards a card using pillage, kneel and sacrifice Scouting Vessel to discard 3 cards instead.

cards.name: Red Rain
cards.text: Unique [greyjoy] character only. If attached character is The Drumm, he gains stealth. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which attached character is attacking, it gains 2 power. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Fleet Captain
cards.text: Attached character gains the Captain trait and gets +1 STR. (+3 STR instead if you control 3 or more Warship locations.)

cards.name: What Is Dead May Never Die
cards.text: Reaction: After you win dominance, choose a [greyjoy] character in your dead pile and put it into play.

cards.name: Nighttime Raid
cards.text: Action: Choose up to 3 characters with pillage and/or the Raider trait. Until the end of the phase, each of those characters gains stealth.

cards.name: Khorane Sathmantes
cards.text: Action: Kneel Khorane Sathmantes and a Warship location to choose and kneel 1 character and 1 location.

cards.name: Fury
cards.text: While you control Stannis Baratheon, he gains intimidate. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, kneel Fury to choose a character or location. Move 1 power from that card to your faction card.

cards.name: Gunthor Son of Gurn
cards.text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Gunthor Son of Gurn is attacking, the losing opponent must choose and discard 1 card from his or her hand.

cards.name: My Mind Is My Weapon
cards.text: Action: During a [military] challenge, choose a character you control with an [intrigue] icon and have it participate in the challenge on your side.

cards.name: Desert Raider
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, put Desert Raider into play from your dead pile and choose a character controlled by the winning opponent. That character gains 1 power. Until the end of the phase, that character loses an [intrigue] or [power] icon and Desert Raider gains that icon.

cards.name: The Bloodroyal
cards.text:
[martell] character only.
While you are not the first player, attached character gains stealth and renown.

cards.name: Vindictive Ranger
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, Vindictive Ranger gains stealth and a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Westwatch-by-the-Bridge
cards.text: Action: Kneel Westwatch-by-the-Bridge to choose and stand another [thenightswatch] location with printed cost 1 or lower. (Printed cost 4 or lower instead if you control a Ranger character, a Steward character, and a Builder character.)

cards.name: Maester Vyman
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [military] or [power] challenge, kneel Maester Vyman to choose another character that shares a Trait with him. That character gains 1 power.

cards.name: Karhold
cards.text: While a player does not have a Winter plot card revealed, characters and locations he or she controls cannot gain power.

cards.name: Cohollo
cards.text: Intimidate. Action: Kneel Cohollo and discard 1 card from your hand to have him participate in a challenge on your side.

cards.name: "Dance of the Dragons"
cards.text: Action: Choose a non-event card with printed cost 3 or lower in your discard pile and return it to your hand.

cards.name: Ser Talbert Serry
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After an opponent triggers a location ability, Ser Talbert Serry gets +2 STR until the end of the phase. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

cards.name: The Shield Islands
cards.text: Increase the number of cards each player draws in the draw phase by 1.

cards.name: Bronze Yohn Royce
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Bronze Yohn Royce is defending, kneel a neutral location with printed cost 1 or higher to stand him. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Rogue Wildling
cards.text: Ambush (5). Reaction: After Rogue Wildling enters play, choose and stand a Wildling character you control.

cards.name: Citadel Archivist
cards.text: Reaction: After Citadel Archivist enters your discard pile, each player shuffles his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

cards.name: The Starry Sept
cards.text: Action: Move 1 power from The Starry Sept to a character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits). Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, The Starry Sept gains 1 power.

cards.name: Reckless
cards.text:
Terminal.
Attached character must be declared as an attacker or defender in each challenge, if able.

cards.name: When I Woke...
cards.text: Reaction: After a player loses a [military] challenge, that player chooses a participating character and places it on top of its owner's deck. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Sea of Blood
cards.text: During [military] challenges, reduce the cost of each event you play by 1 for each blood token on Sea of Blood. You cannot play events during [intrigue] or [power] challenges. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to place a blood token on Sea of Blood. Then, search your deck for an event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: We Take Westeros!
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose a location in a discard pile and put it into play under your control.

cards.name: Return to the Fields
cards.text: When Revealed: You may sacrifice up to 3 characters. For each character sacrificed this way, draw 1 card and gain 1 gold.

cards.name: Heir to the Iron Throne
cards.text: When Revealed: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Lord or Lady character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. Then, sacrifice a Lord or Lady character.

cards.name: Coordinated Attack
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, choose a different challenge type. You may initiate an additional challenge of the chosen type this phase. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Stolen Message
cards.text: Each opponent plays with the top card of his or her deck revealed. Action: Pay 1 gold to place the top card of an opponent's deck on the bottom of that player's deck. (Limit 3 times per round.)

cards.name: Secrets of the Conclave
cards.text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand, discard 1, and put the others back on top of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Vanquish the Unbelievers
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, choose a Trait. Kill each character you control that does not have that Trait (cannot be saved).
